issue.title: [CF 92] Profiles and Dualspec
issue.body:
Profiles and Option to automaticly switch when changing Spec, as once you switch you lose a few Skills for that Talent tree, so TellMeWhen becomes useless for that Spec unless you reconfigure it again and again everytime you switch.


> Posted by CurseForge user Khenjy | Imported from CurseForge issue #92 | Raw

comments.body:
I'm guessing that you haven't noticed that there are options to only show a group in a certain spec, then.

http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/pages/guide/#w-group-settings


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
